EmailTemplate.description: An email is sent to the program notifying that their amendment has been Withdrawn.
EmailTemplate.name: ODE COC Amendment Request Withdrawn
EmailTemplate.subject: Change of Capacity/Space Request Withdrawn for {!CLQ_Program_Transaction__c.CLQ_Program_Name__c} {!CLQ_Role__c.CLQ_Program_name_Formula__c}, {!CLQ_Program_Transaction__c.CLQ_Program_Number__c} {!CLQ_Role__c.CLQ_Program_Number_Formula__c}
